e: ￹`Ma~`fana'ko~ `ngoyos~ `nira~.￺He surely knows how to talk.￻他很會說話(口才好)，口齒伶俐，伶牙俐齒
￹`Tatiih~ `ko~ `ngoyos~ `nira~.￺He speaks in a way that hurts people.￻他說話帶刺,他說話會傷人
￹`Alangoyos~ / `ka~`langoyos~ `cingra~.￺He talks a lot.￻他話說得太多，他人多嘴
￹`ka~`cingoyos~ `kiso~.￺Don't be afraid to talk.￻請你開口說話，不要怕說話，希望你講得頭頭是道
d.f: ￹￺manner with which one speaks￻人說話的態度(樣子)，口才
